parameters.command: =if [ ! -s /context/hot_topics.md ]; then echo "# Hot Topics" > /context/hot_topics.md; echo "" >> /context/hot_topics.md; echo "Leadership concerns, themes, and priorities." >> /context/hot_topics.md; echo "" >> /context/hot_topics.md; fi; echo "- **{{ $json.dateStr }}:** {{ $json.description }}" >> /context/hot_topics.md; echo "SUCCESS"

=if [ -f /context/briefs/{{ $json.filename }}.md ]; then echo "ERROR: Brief already exists"; exit 1; fi; cat > /context/briefs/{{ $json.filename }}.md << 'EOFBRIEF'
# Project: {{ $json.projectName }}

**Status:** Active
**Last Updated:** {{ $json.dateStr }}

## Summary
{{ $json.content || "TODO: Add summary" }}

## My Role
TODO: Define role

## Key Stakeholders
TODO: List stakeholders

## Current Phase
TODO: Describe current phase

## Open Questions / Blockers
TODO: List questions

## Leadership Visibility
TODO: Describe visibility
EOFBRIEF
chmod 644 /context/briefs/{{ $json.filename }}.md; echo "SUCCESS"
